```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(ggthemes)
```
Set `knitr` and `ggplot2` options.
```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
    cache = FALSE,
    fig.path = "Output/",
    dev = c("png", "pdf"),
    message = FALSE,
    warning = FALSE
    )

theme_set(theme_bw())

theme_update(
  axis.text.x = element_text(
    angle = -45,
    hjust = 0,
    vjust = 0.5
  ),
  axis.text.y = element_text(hjust = 0)
)
```

Read the FN, FP, splits and merges data provided by George Zaki. 
```{r}
errors_df <- read_csv('Output/errors_cleaned.csv')
```

Calculate the error percentages
```{r}
calc_perc <- function(a,b){
  return(100*(a/b))
}

levs1 <- c("MCF10A", "U2OS", "HCT116", "Eosinophils")
levs2 <- c("MRCNN", "FPN2-WS", "Jacobkie", "Kaggle_5th")

errors_df <- errors_df %>%
  mutate_at(c("FP", "FN", "merges", "splits"), ~calc_perc(., total)) %>%
  mutate(cell_line = factor(cell_line, levels = levs1),
         model = factor(model, levels = levs2))
```

Generate the the False Positives bar plot.
```{r figS2A, echo = F}
Fig_S2A <- ggplot(errors_df, aes(x = model, 
                                 y = FP))

Fig_S2A + geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  facet_wrap(~ cell_line, 
             nrow = 1,
             scales = "free_y") +
  xlab("Model") +
  ylab("% of False Positives")
```

Generate the the False Negatives bar plot.
```{r figS2B, echo = F}
Fig_S2B <- ggplot(errors_df, aes(x = model, 
                                 y = FN))

Fig_S2B + geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  facet_wrap(~ cell_line, 
             nrow = 1,
             scales = "free_y") +
  xlab("Model") +
  ylab("% of False Negatives")
```

Generate the the Over-splitting bar plot.
```{r figS2C, echo = F}
Fig_S2C <- ggplot(errors_df, aes(x = model, 
                                 y = splits))

Fig_S2C + geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  facet_wrap(~ cell_line, 
             nrow = 1,
             scales = "free_y") +
  xlab("Model") +
  ylab("% of Over-splitting events")
```

Generate the merges plot. 
```{r figS2D, echo = F}
Fig_S2D <- ggplot(errors_df, aes(x = model, 
                                 y = merges))

Fig_S2D + geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  facet_wrap(~ cell_line, 
             nrow = 1,
             scales = "free_y") +
  xlab("Model") +
  ylab("% of Merge events")
```
